typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as double '0.00',
		Column_6 as double '0.00',
		Column_7 as double '0.00'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
